snippet: Two American tourists and their Egyptian guide who were abducted by a Bedouin in the Sinai Peninsula last week were released unharmed on Monday.
abstract: American tourists Rev Michel Louis and Lissa Alphonse and their Egyptian guide Haytham Ragab, who were abducted by a Bedouin in the Sinai Peninsula, are released unharmed after negotiations with security officials and tribal leaders.
lead_paragraph: Two American tourists and their Egyptian guide who were abducted by a Bedouin in the Sinai Peninsula last week were released unharmed on Monday.
